title: Walmart Memorial Day sale 2021: shop deals on TVs, appliances, furniture, more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: The Walmart Memorial Day sale is live - see today's best deals
article: Walmart Memorial Day sales are here, with big savings on everything from the latest tech to patio furniture, kitchen appliances and vacuums. With so much on offer, then, we're rounding up all the best offers in the Memorial Day sales right here.

Memorial Day sales regularly offer excellent discounts on summer essentials like grills, patio furniture, lawn mowers, and more, as well as bargains on home items, electronics, and mattresses. Lucky for you, Walmart has it all, and some of the highlighted Memorial Day deals include tech bargains like the best-selling Apple Watch 3 on sale for $199, a massive $300 discount on this Sony 55-inch 4K TV, and the Lenovo Chromebook on sale for $259 ($309.99). If you're looking for home deals at Walmart's Memorial Day sale, you can find patio furniture deals starting at just $9.99, the iRobot Roomba robot vacuum on sale for $189, and this Farberware air fryer marked down to $59.88 (was $99).
